Create Orders to All Your Suppliers from One Place

Send them directly from BARFLOW, no more emailing or calling.

Streamlined Ordering

  • Browse all of your products from your suppliers in one list
  • Filter by supplier, category or search by name to quickly find what you are looking for
  • Order by smart quantity suggestions based on your stock levels
  • Add products to your basket based on current or previous stock reports
  • See detailed product information including price, par and current inventory levels

Interactive Basket

  • Products are automatically broken down by suppliers
  • Live cost estimation are calculated for each supplier along with the grand total
  • Fast and easy way to adjust quantities or remove products
  • Warnings are shown if minimum spend has not been reached for a supplier

Send with One-click

  • Set requested delivery date
  • Attach a note to the order to avoid confusions
  • Orders can be sent out directly from BARFLOW (optional)
  • Saved and stored safely on the cloud
  • Export purchase order anytime

Stay Up-to-date

  • Track order state: Draft, Sent, Confirmed, Delivered, Paid
  • Quickly add or remove products from the order
  • Update order quantities, product prices or SKU numbers
  • Product updates are also saved to your master product database
  • Attach and store order confirmation and invoice numbers

Keeping You Organized

  • Create unlimited orders and access them from anywhere at any time
  • Export them as Excel sheets so you can use them the way you want
  • Share them with your colleagues or head office
  • Saved and stored safely on the cloud

  • Forever free plan for one venue
  • One-to-one product demo session
  • Assisted venue setup
  • Dedicated phone/email support
This offer is valid for a limited time only, make sure to reserve your spot now!

Track how much stock was used so you can spot variances, easily identify top moving products or dead stock. Share your reports with head office or export them as Excel sheets.
